botManagement.title: Bot Management
botManagement.description: Create and configure Telegram bot for automatic client booking
botManagement.botReady: Telegram bot is ready and accepting bookings
botManagement.botNeedsActivation: Bot activation required to start working
botManagement.howToCreateBot: How to Create a Telegram Bot
botManagement.step1Description: BotFather is the official Telegram bot for creating new bots. Simply type @BotFather in search and open the chat.
botManagement.step1List1: Open Telegram app on your phone or computer
botManagement.step1List3: Click on the bot and press the "Start" button
botManagement.step2Description: BotFather will ask you to specify bot name and username. Username must end with "bot" (e.g., MyAwesomeBot).
botManagement.step2List4: Make sure username is unique and available
botManagement.step3Description: After creating the bot, BotFather will send you a token. Copy it and use it in the "Activation" tab to connect the bot.
botManagement.step3Important: Important: Token must be copied completely, including all characters
botManagement.securityWarning2: Do not publish token in public
botManagement.securityWarning3: Store token in a safe place
botManagement.activationDescription: Enter your Telegram bot token to activate
botManagement.botNotActiveAlert: Bot is not active. Activate it to start working.
botManagement.dontKnowHowToActivate: Don't know how to activate? Go to instructions
botManagement.tokenFormatDescription: Token must have the following format:
botManagement.tokenFormatGetFrom: Get token from @BotFather after creating bot
botManagement.botNotActivatedDescription: To use bot settings, you need to activate it first in the "Activation" tab.
botManagement.basicSettingsDescription: Configure your bot name and description
botManagement.shareBotDescription: Share your bot link with clients
botManagement.scanQRCode: Scan QR code for quick access to bot
botManagement.hoverToCopy: Hover over QR code to copy
botManagement.qrCodeAvailableAfterActivation: QR code will be available after bot activation
botManagement.shareToTelegram: Opened window for sharing to Telegram
botManagement.shareToWhatsApp: Opened window for sharing to WhatsApp

emptyState.title: Start Bot Setup
emptyState.description: Create a Telegram bot in 3 simple steps and start accepting bookings from clients
emptyState.footer: Follow the instructions below for step-by-step guide
